name: Challenge #5: Considering alternatives
description: New concept! Roads now may be a little slower (or faster) to travel. Choose your path wisely! Your task now is to transport the Passenger from City "A" to "D". Also, you should be as fast as possible.
helpText: Every <c>City</c> instance has a property called <m c="City">roads</m>. It is a list of <c>Road</c>s that run from the city to other cities;
The <c>Game</c> instance (last parameter of function <m c="global">init</m>) has a method - <m c="Game">GetTimeBetween</m> - that can provide the time to travel from a <c>City</c> to another;
This challenge has a time limit of 5 seconds. Your <c>Vehicle</c> better choose the best path!.

victory.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.passengersDelivered > 0; }

defeat.text: Timer must not go over 7 seconds
defeat.function: function (vehicles, cities, passengers, game) { return game.elapsedTimeSeconds > 7; }
